page: Kansas State Gloria Funcheon & Heather Woods
title: last words
description:
I could not find the last words you have on the wiki for the sharma card with this tag:

The contemporary discourse of victimization in anti-trafficking ends up creating the alibi needed for repressive state powers by providing our immigration apparatus with the veneer of humanitarianism

I found the first words fine, and I found the rest of the Sharma cards fine, but there does not seem to be any instance of those last words (did nothing to prevent or alleviate their victimage) appearing in the article I am looking at.

replies.body:
upon further research i found those last words in this article:

Political Terror and the Technologies of Memory:
Excuse, Sacrifice, Commodification, and Actuarial Moralities by Allen Feldman Radical History Review 85 (2003) 58-73

whats up with that?

Hey! Thanks for pointing this out. We actually read a piece of Feldman evidence immediately after the Sharma card you're referring to. We have replaced the incorrect ending with the correct one and added the rest of the Feldman evidence.

Sorry about the confusion, thanks for bringing the error to our attention.
